subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance on Ubuntu7.10
body:
Hi.


you'd have to backport them for Gutsy.
Not sure if Ubuntu has something like Debian's backports.org, if so, you
could ask the people there to build backports of the packages.

If anybody is interested in packages for Debian Etch, please let me know
(or even better, write a wishlist bug report to the debian bts).

Cheers,

Bernd
--
Bernd Zeimetz
<bernd@bzed.de>                         <http://bzed.de/>
